scheme_name: Revised Education Scheme For Children Of Artisans/Weavers Of Handicrafts And Handloom Departments
description: The Revised Education Scheme in Jammu and Kashmir provides financial assistance to the children of artisans and weavers registered with the Handicrafts and Handloom Departments to support their education from primary to higher secondary levels. The scheme aims to promote education among these communities.
key_features: Financial support for children of artisans/weavers
Covers primary to higher secondary education
Implemented by the Handicrafts and Handloom Departments

benefits.assistance_amount: Varies based on educational level and department guidelines
benefits.coverage: School fees, books, and other expenses

education_criteria: Children enrolled in primary, secondary, or higher secondary classes
Must be studying in recognized schools
additional_criteria: Parent must be a registered artisan/weaver with the Handicrafts or Handloom Department
Must be a resident of Jammu and Kashmir
institution_criteria: Government or recognized private schools in Jammu and Kashmir

steps: Obtain application form from the Handicrafts or Handloom Department
application_process.note: Contact the department for application details

required_documents.note: To prove Jammu and Kashmir residency

special_notes: Limited to children of registered artisans/weavers
Assistance amount varies based on educational level
Renewal requires proof of continued enrollment
